content: the coral wander hat is crocheted from the bottom up in one piece using simple stitches and an easy 2-row repeat the light texture makes it a cozy wearable hat for all ages sizes newborn to adult large yarn mary maxim starlette worsted weight hook 5 mm h ✨ construction bottom up worked in one piece extras matching scarf pattern available this hat is designed to reach the base of the earlobe and can easily be made more or less slouchy by adjusting the number of repeat row **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d this is just one of the
